replies.body:
How to look for team 101 - A Crash Course

Use your main, or link it (when posting on boards)

Title - LFT (Role) (Rank)
(LFT = Looking for Team)

Main Post
- List your Preferred roles (Primary and Secondary)
- List your main Champs (For those roles)
- Explain if you have discord, Skype, TeamSpeak etc
- List the Times you're available to play, how long you spend playing each day, etc.

Now go and Re-Write this Post, use good English/Grammar/Punctuation

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Would be nice if you also mentioned the Rank of your main. 

How will teams be able to pick you if they don't know if you're Diamond, Master, Challenger, Plat, etc.?

Also, the whole post at the moment looks very unprofessional, so any prospective team would most likely pass this by.
